item.title: 欧元区通胀降至三年低点，减息呼声高涨
item.description: 欧元区通胀率骤降至 2021 年年中以来的最低水平--这强化了欧洲中央银行在不到两周的时间内再次降息的论点。【原文：Euro-area inflation plunged to the lowest level since mid-2021 – reinforcing arguments for another cut in interest rates by the European Central Bank in less than two weeks.】

item.title: 利润下降，中国工商银行计划首次中期分红
item.description: 中国工商银行股份有限公司（Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd.）宣布首次派发中期股息，尽管这家中国最大的银行仍在与利润下滑和创纪录的低利润率作斗争。【原文：Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd. announced its first ever interim dividend even as the nation’s largest bank battles falling profits and record low margins.】

item.title: 南非斯帕公司权衡收购资金紧张的西包公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，南非零售商 Spar Group Ltd. 正在考虑收购资金短缺的 West Pack Lifestyle。【原文：South African retailer Spar Group Ltd. is considering an offer to acquire cash-strapped West Pack Lifestyle, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 比特币 "鲸鱼 "被视为潜在卖家，令加密货币市场感到不安
item.description: 随着8月份即将结束，比特币的走势落后于传统资产，原因是流动性减弱，以及对各国政府可能抛售加密货币库存的担忧挥之不去。【原文：Bitcoin trails traditional assets in August as the month draws to a close, hampered by ebbing liquidity and lingering worries that governments may sell from their stockpiles of the cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 阿姆斯特丹机场业主将投资 60 亿欧元进行升级改造
item.description: 阿姆斯特丹主要机场的所有者史基浦集团（Schiphol Group NV）将在未来五年斥资 60 亿欧元（67 亿美元）升级该枢纽的基础设施，这是迄今为止最大的投资计划。【原文：Schiphol Group NV, the owner of Amsterdam’s main airport, will spend €6 billion ($6.7 billion) in upgrading the hub’s infrastructure over the next five years, its biggest investment plan to date.】

item.title: 德国工会希望 CVC 成为全球国际货运的买家，以挽救工作岗位
item.description: 德国最强大的工会威尔第（Verdi）正在采取不同寻常的行动，支持一家私募股权公司竞购德国铁路公司计划以 140 亿欧元（约合 155 亿美元）出售其全球国际货运（Schenker）物流部门的交易。【原文：Verdi, Germany’s most powerful labor union, is making the unusual move of backing a private equity firm’s bid for Deutsche Bahn’s planned €14 billion ($15.5 billion) sale of its Schenker logistics arm.】

item.title: 牛市势头强劲，印度股市屡创新高
item.description: 印度股市即将迎来一个历史性的里程碑，基准 NSE Nifty 50 指数有望连续第 12 天上涨。【原文：Indian shares are closing in on a historic milestone as the benchmark NSE Nifty 50 Index looks set to gain for the 12th straight day.】

item.title: 法国通胀缓解，欧洲股市再创新高
item.description: 法国通胀数据降温巩固了降息预期，欧洲股市盘中再创新高。【原文：European stocks reached a new intraday record high as cooling French inflation data cemented expectations that interest rate cuts are coming.】

item.title: 施纳贝尔警告：欧洲央行应谨慎对待降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）认为，欧洲中央银行不应过快降低利率，因为通胀率重返 2% 的风险依然存在。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t lower interest rates too quickly as risks to inflation’s return to 2% persist, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 日本金融服务管理局将审查 "有利率的世界 "中的银行风险
item.description: 日本金融监管机构计划审查各大银行在适应 "有利率的世界 "时如何管理与证券投资和外币流动性相关的风险。【原文：Japan’s financial regulator plans to examine how major banks manage risks tied to securities investment and foreign-currency liquidity as they adjust to “a world with interest rates.”】

item.title: 印度取消乙醇用糖限制，全球供应面临威胁
item.description: 印度取消了对使用甘蔗汁制造乙醇的糖厂和蒸馏厂的限制，此举可能会延长世界第二大蔗糖种植国的出口限制，并收紧全球供应。【原文：India has lifted restrictions on sugar mills and distilleries using cane juice to make ethanol, a move that’s likely to prolong export curbs from the world’s second-biggest grower and tighten global supply.】

item.title: 法国通胀回落至三年来最低水平
item.description: 法国的通胀率降至2021年7月以来的最低水平；这为欧洲中央银行在德国和西班牙出现类似放缓之后继续降息提供了支持。【原文：French inflation eased to its lowest level since July 2021 — bolstering the case for the European Central Bank to continue cutting interest rates after similar slowdowns in Germany and Spain.】

item.title: 非洲顶级贷款机构标准银行调整高级管理职位
item.description: 标准银行集团有限公司（Standard Bank Group Ltd.）任命肯尼-菲拉（Kenny Fihla）为副首席执行官兼南非业务领导人，南非业务是该公司最大的地区业务部门。【原文：Standard Bank Group Ltd. appointed Kenny Fihla as its deputy chief executive officer and leader of the South Africa business, its biggest geographic unit.】

HDFC 银行计划通过罕见的债务工具出售 12 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的私人贷款机构 HDFC Bank Ltd. 计划利用一种罕见的债务工具出售多达 1,000 亿卢比（12 亿美元）的贷款组合，因为在筹集存款面临挑战的情况下，该公司正寻求削减在某些行业的风险敞口。【原文：India’s largest private lender HDFC Bank Ltd. plans to sell as much as 100 billion rupees ($1.2 billion) of loan portfolios using a rare debt instrument, as it seeks to cut exposure to certain sectors amid challenges in raising deposits, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 芬兰经济确认季度增长，出口带动经济反弹
item.description: 芬兰第二季度的经济增长与早先的预测基本一致，巩固了人们对这个欧元区最北端成员国正步入更持续复苏轨道的希望。【原文：Finland’s economy grew largely in line with earlier projections in the second quarter, cementing the hopes that the northernmost euro area member is on track to more sustained recovery.】

item.title: 这五张图表说明了日本市场狂热的一个月
item.description: 本月，日本市场出现了数十年来最剧烈的波动，日元汇率从 38 年来的低点急速回升至今年年初以来的最高点，而股市也在历史性的溃败中遭受重创，这是自 1987 年 10 月股市崩盘以来最严重的一次。【原文：Japanese markets have seen the most extreme moves in decades this month, as the yen lurched from a 38-year low back to the highest since the start of the year, while shares were rocked in a historic rout that was the worst since the crash of October 1987.】

item.description: 中国货币延续了近期的升势，升至一年多来从未见过的水平，因为交易员们认为在美元普遍疲软的情况下出现了企业买盘的迹象。【原文：The Chinese currency extended a recent advance to levels unseen in more than a year, as traders mulled signs of corporate buying amid broad dollar weakness.】

item.title: 中国考虑允许 54 亿美元抵押贷款再融资
item.description: 中国正在考虑允许房主对多达 5.4 万亿美元的抵押贷款进行再融资，以降低数百万家庭的借贷成本并促进消费。【原文：China is considering allowing homeowners to refinance as much as $5.4 trillion in mortgages to lower borrowing costs for millions of families and boost consumption.】

item.title: 锌和铝引领金属走向月度涨势
item.description: 工业金属在锌和铝的强势上涨带动下实现月度上涨，原因是有迹象表明美国经济增长有韧性，而且由于美联储准备降息，美元走软。【原文：Industrial metals headed for a monthly gain, led by strong advances in zinc and aluminum, on signs of resilient US growth and a weaker dollar as the Federal Reserve prepares to cut interest rates.】
